doc:
William Mapother https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Mapother 0 William Reibert Mapother Jr. (; born April 17, 1965) is an American actor, known for his role as Ethan Rom on the television series Lost and starring in the film In the Bedroom. He is also known for the film Another Earth. William_Reibert_Mapother_Jr. ( ; born April_17_,_1965 ) is an_American_actor , known for his_role as Ethan_Rom on the_television_series_Lost and starring in the_film In the_Bedroom . He is_also_known for the_film Another_Earth .
